item.title: About me
item.description: About me: Hi! My name is Emiliano Sotelo-Fonseca. I am currently studying for a MSc degree in LANGEBIO, CINVESTAV-IRA working under the supervision of Dr.Â Selene Fernandez-Valverde and Dr.Â Kasia Oktaba. For my masterâ€™s project, I am interested in the 3D genome and bioinformatics. I am analyzing HiC data from Drosophila and Plants to see how genome topology relates (or not) to transcription, and how it impacts genome evolution.

item.title: First blogpost
item.description: Hi This is my hello blogdown world. ðŸ˜„ Here is a tweet with information on regutools: Gracias a @josschavezf1 por retomar el proyecto que inicie junto con @EmilianoSotel10 hace tiempo, me da mucho gusto ver como se va consolidando! Gracias tambien a la excelente tutoria de @fellgernon y @areyesq! Un gran equipo! https://t.co/uxbRCOpfka — Carmina Barjon (@BarjonCar) March 1, 2020 Bottomline: I learned how to insert tweets into blogposts.
